title: Can you get points towards summoner pictures from both teams?

embed.description: In the carnage that shall soon follow, the most deadly Kayn players can earn two limited-edition summoner icons by completing these missions:

body: I like both of these pictures, therefore I have a noteblock where I can keep track of how the missions are doing. My question involve the "Play as, with or against" part. If I am not playing Kayn but I have one one my team and another on the enemy team, and both are going Darkin. Will I get 2 points of the progress for that mission, or will I only get one? Same thing with one darkin, one assassin and 2 assassins.

replies.body: The missions is counting per game, so it will have to be individual matches.  Having 2 Kayns in a match shouldn't impact the requirements of the mission.  Let me know if that clears things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1lXfodg9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-13T20:12:24.339+0000)
>
> The missions is counting per game, so it will have to be individual matches.  Having 2 Kayns in a match shouldn't impact the requirements of the mission.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Ok, that makes it clear. Thanks for the quick response. Was hoping it was counting several in one game because I wont be able to play. Will still try though, cause they are good pics. Good work!
